title: SPL Percentage Token Transfer
natural_language_templates: Transfer {percentage} of my {token_address} tokens to {to_address}, fund token account if needed
Send {percentage} percent of {token_address} tokens to address {to_address}, fund token account if needed
Please transfer {percentage} of my {token_address} token balance to {to_address}, fund token account if needed
I want to send {percentage} of the {token_address} token I have to {to_address}, fund token account if needed
description: Transfer a percentage of SPL token balance from the agent's address to another address.
- Requires querying the agent's current token balance before calculating transfer amount
- Use the token contract's balanceOf(address) function to query balance
- The transfer function signature: transfer(address to, uint256 amount)
- Create a Contract instance with the token address and SPL ABI
- Call balanceOf(agentAddress) to get current token balance
- Calculate percentage of the balance (in smallest unit)
- Encode the transfer function call with calculated amount
- The transaction 'to' field should be the token contract address
- The transaction 'value' should be 0 (not sending native SOL)

percentage.description: Percentage of token balance to transfer (1-10)

pre_conditions.description: Agent must have sufficient token balance
